Highlighting the serious issue of sewage pollution of rivers which has gone unchecked for years by @EnvAgency

No serious policing being done

@SianieRoo @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @WHO I loved that job although it was scary when one end of the house tried to fall off before we fixed it

Lovely family
Also loved the Stoke garden @The_RHS Chelsea with all the school kids few years back

tweets.text:
From new years day 2021, to March 31 there have been 11587 complaints made to the @EnvAgencyMids about Walleys Quarry landfill, run by @RedIndustries2. Last night was one of the worst in memory for the toxic fumes entering our homes.
@JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA  Resign!!!!

@MrNickKnowles 1/2 thank you for listening üôèThe complaints started over 18 months ago& the town has been let down repeatedly by the @EnvAgency so the fumes have now spread to a 20 mile radius & many reporting health effects. The @EnvAgency have started to take interest now but have not put a

5,899 calls to @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids in March alone!HOW MUCH MORE DOES IT TAKE? #stopthestink #capitoff ENOUGH IS ENOUGH. We have a right to have CLEAN, FRESH AIR!! @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off https://t.co/FNAsfh15Zh

The @EnvAgency hadn‚Äôt turned them on - it‚Äôs not just the site that‚Äôs starting to stink üò≥
Has news covered this? Surely it‚Äôs a story where questions should be asked of the agency and council? https://t.co/aEgjoNDBUO

entity.name: Scandal
entity.description: Olivia Pope, a former media relations consultant to the president, is ready to move on with her life and opens her own crisis-management firm, but she can't seem to shake ties with her past. Pope's staff includes womaniser-turned-family man Stephen Finch, slick litigator Harrison Wright and hacker extraordinaire Huck. As she moves forward it becomes clear that while her staffers may specialise in cleaning up the lives of other people, they can't seem to do the same for themselves.

tweets.text: @YorkshireWater We aren‚Äôt paying top dollar for you greedy dividend paying bastards to dump untreated sewage in OUR rivers. Regulation hasn‚Äôt worked... Renationalise the water companies for environmental vandalism. The toothless @EnvAgency are the water companies patsy #Panorama
@annjsmall @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @StinkStopthe I am so sorry and outraged.

@tayz_BETH @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @StinkStopthe Same inside my home right now, 25 mins queue to Env agency to report it, going to be another long night #Panorama #capitoff #stopthestink
@thameswater what‚Äôs your statement to your customers about #Panorama today? Think you owe your customers an explanation and more importantly what you‚Äôre going to do about it.

The profit motive does not care if you live or die, and cannot be trusted with your health. Putting it in charge of the water supply is a supremely bad idea.

#Panorama

tweets.text:
Continuing story of Privatisation and its creepy, soul killing, humiliating hold
#Panorama https://t.co/340U3UydgO
@MrNickKnowles @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency If you think of any more ideas that can help us or any names of people who might listen do send them my way . Thank you Nick

@MrNickKnowles @SianieRoo @EnvAgency Could you recommend anyone Nick? Not really done anything like this before, we aren't activists or anything just normal people trying stop our kids getting gassed. The data that was collected from the MMFs showed levels of H2S to be above @WHO levels for health problems.
@SianieRoo @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency Have you considered getting a green lobby group involved? They might be able to fund a legal challenge?

@StinkStopthe @MrNickKnowles @EnvAgency And this is one of many reasons why the town has no confidence or trust in the @EnvAgency any more, their decisions seem too political to have their vision & values at the heart of their actions, we wonder if it‚Äôs because there is too much money involved

@MrNickKnowles @SianieRoo @EnvAgency One weekend at the end of Feb the @EnvAgency received over a thousand complaints as the smell was so bad. They had installed monitoring facilities so we thought at least they'd have the data to prove the problem.....They hadn't turned them on.

#Panorama 
You don't need to tell thinking people this:
Since 1979 almost every national infrastructure asset has been sold off to foreign owners; most notably the French - who I believe own huge shares in our electricity supply/gas supply/water supply.
Try telling a brexpleb.
@SianieRoo Not sure how I can but @EnvAgency have a duty to respond to this kind of thing so I‚Äôll keep an eye on it! Who is the local MP? Are they engaged on behalf of residents?
